column5: GBT sold too early Immune to the biotech blood out there Maybe because its name is global blood
GBT 2200 July 60 calls bought for 425Shares have been moving higher throughout the afternoon Mentioned GBT in yesterdays Morning Report following September puts sold to open
GBT Let me guess Back to 60 for a close

GBT Re some comments about what the price may do after the 14th presentation its a certainty that there is still some uncertainty about what final HOPE KIDS results are I propose the uncertainty is small but there nonetheless If no one died and results were the same as we have seen thus far I would hope the price would increase some If results are unexpectedly good which I have a gut feeling may be the case we could get a stronger up bump I think its very unlikely that one of the younger study participants died It sounded like Dr Love was upbeat in his quote regarding the fact that this data will be submitted in the NDA
GBT I am just going to keep on adding at these levels Making my bets that we have a lot more upside to come

GBT A lot of Biotech investors always believe their stocks will be bought out I tend to believe that is only a real possibility when a company constantly achieves the high results for their drug If that happens what are the chances of being bought out
GBT if ph 3 is positive I say we shoot to 98 What do you guys think
